channel.title: Help with npcs
channel.description: ok when i kill my black knight titan all his hp goes away then comes back and wont go back down what do i do?

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:4, topic:152443”][quote author=dog eats dog link=topic=208557.msg1829155#msg1829155 date=1192725348]
Get a pring then see what happens? Lol, It what i do when an NPC is Like un-killable

ID for Pring - Perfect Ring Description Mostly used for admins To get 100000+ Str bonus, So they can hit high, Very high, Over 300 HP high

ID = 0773

Have Fun?

[/quote]

Lol…

First of all that doesn’t help him and second of all mr.twiz open up the file called npc.cfg look for the npc id in there and change the hp to what you want then save and compile.[/quote]

Thats wrong? I does help people, Well me and my admins on my server.
When you can’t kill a monster get a Perfect ring then test, If that don’t work find the problem in the source.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @Psychopathic Psychopathic
item.description:
@Psychopathic wrote:

this is mr.twiztid and yes i did that i saved and compile and he still wont die!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Did you save and compile because he has to die if you did that,try changing it to 20 hp and make sure you do the correct npc and save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with npcs
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:2, topic:152443”]Get a pring then see what happens? Lol, It what i do when an NPC is Like un-killable

ID for Pring - Perfect Ring Description Mostly used for admins To get 100000+ Str bonus, So they can hit high, Very high, Over 300 HP high

ID = 0773

Have Fun?[/quote]

Lol…

First of all that doesn’t help him and second of all mr.twiz open up the file called npc.cfg look for the npc id in there and change the hp to what you want then save and compile.

Read full topic
